comments.author: u279076@disabled.tld
comments.text:
Originally from bug 678191, fallout from bug 588506.

If about:sessionrestore is already open in a tab we should just switch to it. Currently, additional instances of about:sessionrestore appear as empty sessions.
comments.creator: u279076@disabled.tld
comments.raw_text:
Originally from bug 678191, fallout from bug 588506.

If about:sessionrestore is already open in a tab we should just switch to it. Currently, additional instances of about:sessionrestore appear as empty sessions.
